answers.answer: How far are you? Im 34 weeks and i just started noticing im thirsty allll the time! Just keep drinkin
I have dry mouth as well. Try drinking a 7 up or sonething other than h2o. It helped me to get rid of the dry mouth .

I do that too. I am drinking cups that are 44 oz and I fill them up at least 8 times a day and they are like drink more water.....how? Then someone told me its a sign of gestational diabetes which I later found out I had.:-(
I get like that every now n then its terrible

Im only 10 weeks 2 days! Gosh i hate it! Chewing gum, drinking water, nothing helps!i did have some sierra mist today but i didnt really notice a difference. I brush my teeth sooo much to try and help and it doesnt. Blahhh!!!

My mom and I were talking about that the other day because since i have became pregnant ive found out i have hypothyroid disease. She said gestational diabetes normally goes away after pregnancy hopefully it does!!
Maybe u need electrolytes. Drink Gatorade to replenish them

question: My mouth is always sooooo dry! No matter how much water i drink, its dry and it feels so gross! Anyone else have this problem? Am i dehydrated or something? I drink plenty of water, thats actually all that i drink. But it doesnt help!
title: yuckie!!
